title: Robin Goodfellow's racing tips for Saturday, October 12
text:
Sir Mark Prescott has endured a rather tumultuous relationship with the Cesarewitch but he boasts two brilliant chances of ending the hoodoo on Saturday.

The Newmarket trainer has witnessed a succession of well-handicapped and well-fancied stayers find the £350,000 marathon beyond them, but TIMOSHENKO (Newmarket, 4.10) and Land Of Oz must surely go close for him tomorrow.

The latter, a cosy winner of the Cesarewitch Trial at HQ three weeks ago, is arguably the more eye-catching given he sits at the foot of the weights. But Timoshenko’s participation was never in doubt once he had made a workmanlike winning comeback at Goodwood in July.

Much like Land Of Oz, the selection possesses a rather languid racing style which suggests plenty of untapped potential and today’s conditions should be no issue.

Robin Goodfellow gives you all of his top tips ahead of a packed day of races on Saturday

NEWMARKET

ROBIN GOODFELLOW 1.45 Ascension 2.20 Volkan Star 2:55 Molatham 3:30 Pinatubo 4:10 Timoshenko (nb) 4:45 Bravo Sierra 5:20 Matterhorn GIMCRACK 1.45 Ascension 2.20 Max Vega 2.55 Cherokee Trail 3.30 Pinatubo 4.10 Seinesational (nap 4.45 Show Stealer 5.20 Look Around

YORK

ROBIN GOODFELLOW 2.05 Convict 2.40 Lampang 3.15 Johnny Drama 3.50 Aplomb 4.25 Fox Duty Free 5.00 Arrowtown 5.35 Addis Ababa GIMCRACK 2.05 Convict 2.40 Lampang 3.15 Coolagh Forest 3.50 Danzeno (nb) 4.25 Colour Image 5.00 Arrowtown 5.35 Ayutthaya

CHEPSTOW
description: Sir Mark Prescott has endured a rather tumultuous relationship with the Cesarewitch but he boasts two brilliant chances of ending the hoodoo on Saturday.
authors: Sam Turner For The Daily Mail
